answers.answer: I've never had it but my MIL did with her surprise baby. She ended up on bedrest for a large part of her pregnancy and now my sister in law is a healthy almost 18 year old pain in the butt.  ;)

I had it with my first and had him 4 weeks early. Im now 25weeks pregnant with my second I'm just being monitored closely with extra appointment and scans but no reason why baby won't be healthy although I may have to be induced early again. Don't panic they will just keep an eye on you more this time. Congrats and good luck xx
I had it with my first, but I'm on my fourth now and no problems. Actually my bp is a little low
I had it with my daughter and son. I had the both a few weeks early but they are both healthy.

I had it with my 2nd pregnant now 9wks the doctor will keep a closer eye on both u n baby with regular check ups n possibly bed rest as u get closer n yes u may have to be induced sooner but the doctor will choose wat is safer for both of u if u ever have questions or concerns dont be afraid to ask the doctor call them that's wat they are there for
Thank you all!:)Made me feel a whole lot better :)

question: I got preeclampsia in my 1st pregnancy & just recently found out I'm pregnant again.. I am kinda scared that I may not be able to keep the baby because of the Preeclampsia.. Am I over thinking this? Am I & my baby gonna be ok? Any mommies out there that have had preeclampsia before & still delivered a healthy baby? I just wanna have peace at mind. I don't have my drs appt until  this coming Thursday. But I wanna know Now from experienced mothers.
title: Preeclampsia..?
